text: Berezovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Kananikolsky Selsoviet, Zilairsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 77 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 83 km from Zilair, 18 km from Kananikolskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zilairsky District
title: Berezovka, Zilairsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
